name: Speed Skating Champs
description:
Race the best Skaters in the World in this special edition of Flick Champions Winter Sport!
Achieve a perfect lap, take an ice breath and slide in again to beat your time one more time! Win, or deal with figure skating instead.


FEATURES:
► INSTANT PICK-UP AND PLAY, with EXTREMELY EASY CONTROLS.
► Real-time, cross-platform Speed Skating race!
► Individual or 2-Player mode
► Unique graphics style
► Global Ranking of the best (and worst!) Skaters!
► Lightweight, smooth and User-friendly


Stay tuned for more online multiplayer sporting events, powered by Flick Champions ™!
